content.prompt: Which of the following would most likely occur if the Nigerian government were to follow the advice of this article?

choices.label: Nigeria would concentrate on ending poverty for all citizens.
Nigeria would invest more resources in health care and education.
Nigeria would lower the price of domestic oil and gas to make them more affordable for average citizens.
President Jonathan would face criminal charges and potentially be removed from office.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
